lines.text: From vast upheavals born of lust for world dominion, come waves of misery, surging on to buffet helpless lives on distant shores.
Far beyond the horizon clouds are gathering - sullen, sinister, menacing.
When you marry Angela, we'll tell you our system to make her work - like ten devils! We flatter the poor little sardine...
You shrivelled herring, you struck me!
To part is to die a little.
Remember what you promised about your underclothes.
You speak so funny my language. Where do you come from, eh?
Never before have I met the breed... is is very nice.
Would he like me better if I were romantic? Or would he prefer one of those kittenish girls? No, I shall be cold and haughty like the ladies of Rome! Yes - I shall refuse him!
Father Lorenzo would never allow this!
This stranger that you wish to marry in secret. Are you sure, my child, that you love him?
It must be love, Father Lorenzo. I suffer so much the sweet pain of happiness.
Angela, I am an enemy of your country, but not a traitor to you.
